doc.field: Fire tech binders labeled 43, 44 (with various FDNY firefighting procedures and material for Spadafora's (instructor) 2013 Officer's Prep Course (with 2 unlabeled floppies), and 47 (for Spadafora's 2014 officer prep course, with CD. (See scope note for list of all related binders 1-48 and the boxes they are in.) Binder: Fire Tech Battalion Chief Promotion Course materials, 2008. Binder labeled "Promotions" includes: department orders and supplements to orders re: promotions and transfers, many if not all tracing Spadafora's rise through the ranks; congratulatory cards and some photos are in binder as well as other personal things (paystubs, etc.); also includes some general ref material on promotions in FDNY and an annotated 1980s fire tech exam; ranges from circa 1990s-2002. Binder labeled "Captains Exams" for various years, 1977-97. Loose training/exam related print matter. Spadafora's Probationary Firefighter Reference Manual, 1978. FDNY annual report, 1980. A 1948 invoice for bedroom furniture sold to Arnold Lord. (Includes digital formats)
